user_prompt: create epics and user stories for the use case

epics.title: Project Setup and Architecture Foundation
epics.summary: Establish the foundational architecture and development environment for the project
epics.description: Initialize the project by setting up repositories, environments, build configurations, and CI/CD pipelines. Define coding standards, select frameworks, and architect the system to ensure scalability and maintainability. This epic includes documentation and base setup for all teams to ensure smooth collaboration and code consistency.

epics.title: User Management and Authentication
epics.summary: Implement secure authentication and user role management
epics.description: Develop a secure user authentication module that supports sign-up, login, password recovery, and session management. Implement role-based access control for different user permissions to restrict and manage access across the platform. Ensure security compliance, encryption, and audit logging throughout the authentication process.

epics.title: Core Business Feature Implementation
epics.summary: Develop and implement core modules supporting primary business functions
epics.description: Design and develop the main operational modules that fulfill the core business objectives. Define key workflows, implement CRUD operations, and integrate core services or APIs. Maintain separation of concerns between components and ensure efficient data handling through well-designed backend integration.

epics.title: User Interface and Experience Design
epics.summary: Design an engaging, accessible, and responsive front-end interface
epics.description: Build the user interface that provides a seamless interaction experience. Implement responsive layouts, visually consistent components, and accessibility features for inclusiveness. Conduct usability testing and incorporate feedback to optimize user experience while maintaining performance across multiple devices.

epics.title: Integration and Advanced Features
epics.summary: Integrate with external services and implement advanced functionality
epics.description: Develop system integrations with third-party services such as payment gateways, analytics, or communication APIs. Add advanced features including automated notifications, dashboards, and reporting systems. Optimize external API handling for reliability, performance, and security within integrated workflows.

epics.title: Quality Assurance, Deployment, and Monitoring
epics.summary: Test, deploy, and monitor the application to ensure optimal performance
epics.description: Use automated testing, code reviews, and performance tests to validate functionality and reliability. Deploy the application in staging and production environments through automated pipelines. Implement monitoring tools for uptime tracking, logging, and error detection, ensuring continuous improvement and operational visibility.

user_stories.title: Repository Initialization
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to set up the project repository, so that I can maintain a centralized and organized codebase.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure version control, follow branching strategy.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The project repository is created and the initial structure is set up.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a new project, when I initialize the repository, then I should see the initial project structure.

user_stories.title: Environment Setup
user_stories.description: As a devOps engineer, I want to set up development and staging environments, so that I can ensure consistent and scalable development practices.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Setup both local and remote environments, ensure compatibility.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Development and staging environments are correctly configured and operational.
user_stories.test_cases: Given blank environments, when I set them up, then they should be configured for development and staging.

user_stories.title: User Authentication Module
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to securely sign up, log in, recover my password, and manage my session, so that I can access my account safely.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users can sign up, log in, recover their passwords, and manage their session securely.
user_stories.test_cases: Given valid user data, when I sign up, log in, recover password, or manage session, then these actions should be secure and functional.

user_stories.title: Role-Based Access Control
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want to assign roles and manage permissions, so that I can control access across the platform.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Implement roles, restrict permissions based on roles.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Admin can assign roles and manage permissions effectively.
user_stories.test_cases: Given user roles, when I assign or revoke permissions, then access levels should be correctly enforced.

user_stories.title: Core Module Development
user_stories.description: As a product manager, I want to design and develop primary operational modules, so that the core business functions are supported.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Define workflows, ensure separation of concerns.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Core modules are developed and support primary business functions.
user_stories.test_cases: Given defined workflows, when I execute core functions, then the system should behave correctly.

user_stories.title: Responsive UI Design
user_stories.description: As a UX designer, I want to build responsive layouts and accessible components, so that users have a seamless and inclusive experience.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: UI is responsive and meets accessibility standards across devices.
user_stories.test_cases: Given different devices, when I interact with the UI, then it should be responsive and accessible.

user_stories.title: Third-Party Service Integration
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to integrate with external services, so that the application can provide advanced functionality like payments and analytics.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Third-party services are integrated and functional.
user_stories.test_cases: Given valid API credentials, when I integrate a service, then it should function as expected within the application.

user_stories.title: Automated Testing and Deployment
user_stories.description: As a QA engineer, I want to automate tests and deployment pipelines, so that the application quality is consistently assured.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Automated tests and deployment pipelines are operational and ensure code quality.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a code change, when it triggers the pipeline, then tests should run and deployment should be automated if they pass.

architecture_generation.description: Architecture for a secure and robust banking website using Azure services to ensure scalability, reliability, and security.
